meanings.definition: A plant with two seed leaves
meanings.sent1: The dicotyl in the garden is growing well.
meanings.sent2: I learned about dicotyls in my science class.
meanings.sent3: The dicotyl decided to sprout its two seed leaves in the shape of a heart.
meanings.sent4: The dicotyl stood out among the other plants like a pair of green wings.
meanings.sent5: The dicotyl's two seed leaves make it unique and easy to identify.

meanings.definition: A member of the dicotyledon class of plants
meanings.sent1: Have you seen the dicotyl in the botanical garden?
meanings.sent2: The dicotyls in the park add beauty to the surroundings.
meanings.sent3: The dicotyl told the other plants jokes to make them laugh.
meanings.sent4: The dicotyls in the field stood tall like soldiers in formation.
meanings.sent5: The dicotyl's presence in the garden brings a sense of elegance and diversity.
